input.sentences: me and my husband went to a spot overlooking a local beach .
the lighthouse was really cute up close .
it was also a really beautiful scene from further away .
i wonder how far that jet stream goes !
output.sentences: Everyone's favorite spot in town was a cliff overlooking the local beach.
It was a great place for lovebirds to go on dates to take pictures and watch the ocean.
Close to the edge of the cliff was a cute old lighthouse.
The rustic features with the backdrop of the ocean made a beautiful scene.
The only thing higher than the lighthouse on the cliff was the airstream passing jets would release.
